experimentalFeature.description: Forces closing of WSL process input stream to prevent process zombification. See https://github.com/Microsoft/WSL/issues/2592 Required for Windows 10 version prior 1803
Allow IDE to use the \\wsl$\ paths to access the WSL filesystem using P9 protocol (available since Windows update 1903).
Show P9 roots (\\wsl$\...) of available WSL distributions in the file chooser (available since Windows update 1903).

registryKey.description: Use KWallet if KWallet & SecretService are both available.

experimentalFeature.description: Inlines browse button inside TextFieldWithBrowseButton component
Integration with global menu in Linux
Second Cmd/Ctrl+E switches to Recently Edited Files
Use popups (instead of dialogs) for creating new items (files, classes, etc.)
Defines whether to show "What's new" notification after IDE update or not.

registryKey.description: Shows recent files or code locations last visited timestamps
Defines storing Run Anything context combobox directories number.
